title: Thomas Chatterton Williams on ‘Unlearning Race’
description: Williams talks about his new memoir, “Self-Portrait in Black and White,” and Stephen Kinzer discusses “Poisoner in Chief: Sidney Gottlieb and the CIA Search for Mind Control.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
